JOB DESCRIPTION: About the role you will be applying for...       We are seeking talented, motivated engineers to join our team to enhance and build robust software used to deliver customer personalizations in a highly scalable SaaS application.       As a Principal Software Engineer, you will       work with the team to    build high volume, highly available services in Java, using cloud based services from Amazon Web Services     write clean, SOLID, and testable Java code     lead Scrum software development lifecycle     work with Product Team on feature refinement and defining and estimating technical effort     work with Architecture Team and Engineering Team on technical designs     provide product support to internal and external stakeholders     work in a DevOps team environment owning and operating the services you build     perform code reviews and mentor and guide team members     monitor development effort and implement improvements as needed        To be successful in this role, you must       have experience in running and debugging highly scalable and distributed systems     have advanced knowledge in clean, SOLID Java code development     have advanced skills in popular Java frameworks such as Maven, Spring, Hibernate, JUnit     have advanced skills in SQL, commonly used Design Patterns     have advanced knowledge in using git, JIRA     experience in REST API design     have excellent oral and written communication skills     be a team player in distributed and cross team environments     strong experience in technical system and application design     have experience leading or mentoring an engineering team     be self motivated with a strong work ethic      You may get bonus points if you have experience with...      working in an agile/scrum environment     AWS or other Cloud services     OpenAPI specification
